mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id as boardId, b.user_id as userId, u.user_image_path as userImagePath, u.user_name as userName, cs.campsite_code as campsiteCode, cs.campsite_name as campsiteName, cs.mapX as mapX, cs.mapY as mapY, b.board_content as boardContent, b.post_date as postDate, b.comment_cnt as commentCnt, b.like_cnt as likeCnt FROM boards as b, users as u, campsites as cs WHERE b.user_id = u.user_id AND b.campsite_code = cs.campsite_code AND b.board_content LIKE concat('%', '${search}' ,'%') AND cs.campsite_code LIKE concat('%', '${campsiteCode}' ,'%') GROUP BY b.board_id ORDER BY ${order} desc LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset};
SELECT * FROM boards ORDER BY board_id DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT * FROM boards ORDER BY like_cnt DESC;
SELECT comment_cnt FROM boards WHERE board_id = '${board_id}';
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boards(user_id, campsite_code, board_content) VALUES ('${userId}', '${campsiteCode}', '${boardContent}');
mapper.update: UPDATE boards SET like_cnt = like_cnt + 1 WHERE board_id = '${boardId}';
UPDATE boards SET like_cnt = like_cnt - 1 WHERE board_id = '${boardId}';
UPDATE boards SET comment_cnt = comment_cnt + 1 WHERE board_id = '${boardId}';
UPDATE boards SET comment_cnt = comment_cnt - 1 WHERE board_id = '${boardId}';
UPDATE boards SET comment_cnt = comment_cnt - '${commentCnt}' WHERE board_id = '${boardId}';
